win_condition.primary: Destroy the Relic (Attack) / Protect the Relic (Defend)

mechanics.Demolishers: The only way to win efficiently.
mechanics.policy: Protect Demos. Kill Demos. Ignore everything else.

Seaforium_Charge.name: Seaforium Charge
Seaforium_Charge.spawn_location: Barrels at the Docks (Start) and Courtyards
Seaforium_Charge.strategy: Plant at the center of the Gate. Defend until explosion.

Attacker.drivers: Drive to gate. IGNORE PLAYERS. Do not turn to fight.
Attacker.escort: CC and Peel for the Demo. Do not chase kills away from the specific Demo you are guarding.

Defender.focus: KILL DEMOLISHERS. Do not fight infantry unless they are planting bombs.
Defender.turrets: Focus fire Demos. Do not shoot players unless Demos are dead.

Demolishers.strategy: Spawn -> Drive -> Siege. Round ends when Relic dies.

Graveyards.strategy: Cap to move spawn point closer. Critical for maintaining Demo wave pressure.

Attack_Round.tactics: Split Demos. Hit Blue/Green gates simultaneously. Rush GY caps. Zerg Relic.

Defense_Round.tactics: Hold the Beach. Focus Demos. Fall back instantly if gate is breached. Don't get farmed at a lost gate.
